Features.AccountsDesc1: Account for day care to report the daily activities like naps, foods, pottys, attendance, activitites, moods etc.
Features.AccountsDesc2: Account for parents to track the daily activities of their kids posted by the family day care either from the account or from the email.
Features.ReportsDesc1: Daily reports for kids activities, foods, naps, pottys, moods, attendance and many more.
Features.ReportsDesc2: Email daily reports/sheets and reminders to parents.
Features.CustomReportsTitle: Create Custom Reports for Kids in your day care now
Features.CustomReportsDesc: We know that the daily report log provided by Gigglesware may not meet all your needs. Now you can create custom report log for your kids daily activities according to your needs. Choose between the Gigglesware provided report or create your own report. Imagination is your only limit.
Features.CustomReportsDescTitle: With Custom Reports you have two options
Features.CustomReportsSubDesc1: Upload an existing report or log that your daycare is already using and we will do the rest.
Features.CustomReportsSubDesc2: If there is no existing report or log, create one from scratch with Gigglesware.
Features.InstantLogDesc: We know how much time is important for day care providers. So we have introduced Instant Log feature where you can just type a single sentence of Kid's activity be it a nap, diaper or any activity and we do the rest for you. Give Instant Log a try now.
Features.AssistantDesc: We know how busy a day care can be taking care of the kids hence we have introduced Assistant. With Assistant, you can tap the speaker and speak and we do the rest i.e. extracting the use ful info and auto filling the reports for you. GigglesWare Assistant is only available on Android and IPhone IOs now.
Features.NotificationsDesc: Get notified about the vaccines and other major milestones when the kid is ready for them. Other notifications include reports and others forgotten to be filled the given day.
Features.DocumentsDesc: Documents feature let you upload share, email important documents related to your daycare with others.
Features.SearchDesc: Search the reports/sheets for a given day
Features.MultipleLanguagesDesc: GigglesWare is now offered in two languages. English and Español
Features.MultipleLanguagesHelp: All you have to do is select your language from navigation bar on top right of the page and we will do the rest.
